titles.title: I Pray For Them. I Pray Not For The World

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I pray for them. I pray not for the world,
But for them which Thou has given me.
(Repeat.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For all mine are Thing,
And all Thine are mine.
And mine are Thine and Thine are mine.
(Repeat.)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And I am glorified in them,
That they may be one.
I am glorified in them.
